title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Stairs, Figure, Ionic Columns and Houses"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract design of stairs leading from lower left to center middle, with figure with Ionic columns on either side and little houses at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Stairs, Figure, Ionic Columns and Houses".
Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-101.
